body:
Hmm, if its not casted to long first, this compile error appears:
>error: static_cast from 'pthread_t' (aka 'pthread *') to 'int32' (aka 'int') is not allowed
>int32 tid = static_cast<int32>(pthread_self());

I'm no c coder so don't really know if there is a more elegant solution to this issue :)
body_html:
Hmm, if its not casted to long first, this compile error appears:

error: static_cast from 'pthread_t' (aka 'pthread *') to 'int32' (aka 'int') is not allowed
int32 tid = static_cast(pthread_self());

I'm no c coder so don't really know if there is a more elegant solution to this issue :)
body_text:
Hmm, if its not casted to long first, this compile error appears:

error: static_cast from 'pthread_t' (aka 'pthread *') to 'int32' (aka 'int') is not allowed
int32 tid = static_cast(pthread_self());

I'm no c coder so don't really know if there is a more elegant solution to this issue :)
